title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.5 - Standards pertaining to eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.5 - Standards pertaining to eligibility

State Regulations
(a) All local governmental units are eligible
to participate in the community based service system for children with serious
emotional disturbance. (b) All
providers of service who enter into contract with the local governmental unit
for such purposes are eligible to participate in the community based service
system for children with serious emotional disturbance. (c) The recipients of services provided by
the community based service system shall be children and adolescents with
serious emotional disturbance as defined in section
507.4
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
507.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
